comment.author: 20119204@N07
comment._content: Kvikne's Hotel, Balholm. See pics of the architecture and history: dnn2.kvikneseng.gasta.no/

comment.author: 34312291@N04
comment._content: Balholm now is called Balestrand while the old name still can be in use sometimes. The large building in the middle is a hotel which is still there, Kvikne Hotel.  The hotel is now white coloured with a 1974 concrete hotel room structure behind.
